titleStmt.title: A song or, story, for the lasting remembrance of diuers famous works, which God hath done in our time With an addition of certaine other verses (both Latine and English) to the same purpose.
titleStmt.author: Wilson, John, 1588-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Young for I. Bartlet, at the golden Cup in Cheape-side,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A song of thankesgiuing for great deliuerances.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
